dict.acceptation: 高速公路；汽车道；快车道；

sent.orig: This place covers the land area20 square kilometers, spans Jingzhu motorway, 107 motorway and Jidong motorway.
sent.trans: 园区规划面积20平方公里，横、跨越京珠高速，107国道和济东高速。

sent.orig: Sign indicating a motorway. Sign can be reconfigured to indicate the end of a motorway.
sent.trans: 拖到绘图页后，可以添加高速公路标志。右击可以指示高速公路的终端。

sent.orig: A multiple crash can often be seen on that motorway.
sent.trans: 那条公路上的联环撞车事故很多。

sent.orig: Our car had a breakdown on the motorway.
sent.trans: 我们的汽车在高速公路上抛锚了。

sent.orig: Several cars piled up after ignoring the fog warning on the motorway.
sent.trans: 由于无视高速公路上的大雾警告，有好几辆汽车相撞。
